players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "'I find it suspicious that Bob was the one who was killed last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game.'..."
You: "I agree we need to stay vigilant. Since Bob was killed, the mafia likely saw him as a threat. Let's discuss our observations so far."
You: "I think we should look at who was silent last round. Charlie didn't say anything - that's suspicious behavior to me."

Charlie: "I'd like to clarify that I didn't have any contact with Bob last night. In fact, I barely spoke to him during the game so far. It's important for us to focus on finding the real killer and not jump to conclusions based on..."

Diana: "I believe it's important for us to consider all information when trying to identify the mafia. While Charlie's silence last night could be a red flag, let's not forget that they also claimed they had no contact with Bob. I suggest we all..."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
